name: Halloween Running
description:
Halloween is coming. Do you feel excited??? Do you want to be a Halloween runner? Let’s play a addictive Halloween game!

Halloween Running – an interesting game for this Halloween. The most special things are famous characters in many stories we all know. Do you know Goblin? He is one of characters of this game.

These famous characters play an important role in Halloween Running. Their mission is being cute zombies, running and passing obstacles. These Halloween screen is very familiar but contains a lot of traps and unpredictability.

Features:

• There are many different characters when being a Halloween runner such as: Goblin, Satan, Dracula, Frankenstien, Egypt Skeleton. You can transform from this character to another if you want. You can use the different skills which belong to each character in Halloween Running.

• Halloween Running has diversified maps which make players excited.

• In the way you run, you can get much useful assistance which can help you finish safe.

• Many obstacles in run-way from Hero to invisible barricades make you feel hard when running.

How to play:

• Control the character to jump and slip by touch into the controlled keys in the screen to pass traps and bad terrains in this Halloween Game run-way.

• Collect glowworms, pumpkins and other items in run-way. Glowworms are used to unlock new characters. Pumpkins are used to evaluate your achievement.

• Each map contains 3pumpkins and you have to get at least 1 to unlock the next map.

Running and Running. It’s very simple. Right? Download Halloween Running to experience the atmosphere of Halloween with the cute characters right now!

Don’t forget to rate us 5* if you like Halloween Running!

Keep in touch with us: https://www.facebook.com/HalloweenRunningGame

Hope you enjoy it!
